abstract: Gallup poll finds U S pub favors loan extensions to Allies if victory is at stake
snippet: A large part of the American public would favor extending loans to the Allied powers if their "ultimate success" in the war depended upon loans, according to a survey made public yesterday by the American Institute of Public Opinion, of which Dr. ...

headline.main: WILLINGNESS TO LEND TO ALLIES IS FOUND; But Only if 'Ultimate Success' Is at Stake, Survey Finds

lead_paragraph: A large part of the American public would favor extending loans to the Allied powers if their "ultimate success" in the war depended upon loans, according to a survey made public yesterday by the American Institute of Public Opinion, of which Dr. George Gallup is director.
